channel.title: Logotherapy for Optimal Living
channel.managingEditor: logotherapy@solidgold.co.za (Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa | Solid Gold Podcasts)
channel.copyright: © Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa - all rights reserved
channel.description:
As human beings, we are essentially spiritual creatures.

We seek meaning in life, and feel complete only when we live with a sense of purpose and destiny.

Produced by https://SolidGold.co.za — #BeHeard
channel.itunes:subtitle: Logotherapy - helping people to understand and integrate meaning in their lives.
channel.itunes:author: Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa | Solid Gold Podcasts

item.title: Life is a Matter of Choice | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:title: Life is a Matter of Choice | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:subtitle: Our Lives are Determined by the Choices We Make
item.description:
Life is a Matter of Choice — Our Lives are Determined by the Choices We Make Teria Shantall (VFISA | President) talks about the life-changing impact of making responsible and morally-upstanding choices.


Viktor Frankl Institure for Logotherapy South Africa https://vfisa.co.za

Stay up-to-date with us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/LogotherapySA/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za
